# Ear for Music (Trait)
## Overview
**Ear for Music ([[Shelyn]]):** You spent countless hours of your youth in one of [[Shelyn]]'s temples, listening to wonderful musicians and singers. You gain a +1 trait bonus on one category of [[Perform (Skill)|Perform]] checks and a +2 trait bonus on [[Knowledge (Skill)|Knowledge]] (local) checks that deal with the local art or music scene.

**Source:** Ultimate Campaign, pg. 64
